microservicesApplications.name: Architecting and developing modern and scalable applications based on microservices

interJava.name: Bootcamp Inter Java Developer
interJava.description: Inter Java Developer Bootcamp made on Digital Innovation One platform with learning various topics like Spring Boot, JPA, Kafka, Cloud Stream, Postgres, Lombok, Schema Registry, CQRS, Quarkus, Kubernetes, AWS EKS, Tests, Messaging Architecture, BI, Data Warehouse, Big Data, Data Lake, DevOps.

devOpsModule.name: DevOps Challenge
devOpsModule.description: Challenges of the DevOps module of my microservices course. Nginx + Laravel + Redis + MySQL with docker-compose, Kubernetes and pipelines for continuous integration and continuous deployment in a Kubernetes Cluster on Google Cloud Platform.

imageProcessing.name: Mammography images classifier
imageProcessing.description: A Python program that uses neural networks to classify mammography exams and seeks to differentiate breast density in order to identify tumors or other problems.

localizaLabs.name: Localiza Labs API
localizaLabs.description: The Localiza Labs Academy was a program that selected, among thousands, 20 candidates for an intensive .NET training in 3 weeks with the development of a challenge at the end. This project was the winning project in the backend area :D. Certificate

internIoasys.name: Full Stack Development Intern
internIoasys.description: Node.JS, express, JWT, OAuth 2.0, sequelize, tests (jest, chai, sinon), AWS Lambda Serverless, AWS RDS, AWS EC2, AWS S3, SAML, dotenv, MySQL, Postgres, Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Bitbucket Pipelines CI/CD
internIoasys.description2: React, hooks, redux, redux-saga, styled components, yup, bootstrap, i18n (react-intl), tests (jest)

webDevIntern.name: Web Development Intern
webDevIntern.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel, MySQL, Docker, Nginx

softwareEngineering.name: Software Engineering in Projects
softwareEngineering.description: Always wanting use cases where I can learn and apply software engineering patterns to structure the system :D

artificialIntelligence.name: Artificial intelligence
artificialIntelligence.description: Algorithms, approaches, tests, among other things.
